function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in the food truck environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread among customers and workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures, limit the number of customers in the area, and provide clear guidance for safe interactions","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, mobile ordering apps, and digital menus","People":"Customers, food truck workers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Ineffective communication of health and safety measures","Impact":"Confusion and lack of trust among customers, leading to reduced patronage","Mitigation":"Provide clear and transparent communication of health and safety protocols, regularly update customers on measures taken, and establish trust through consistent messaging","Technologies":"Social media, email newsletters, and digital signage","People":"Customers, food truck workers","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Reliance on social media for customer engagement","Impact":"Limited reach to customers who are not active on social media, leading to a potential loss of customer base","Mitigation":"Diversify customer engagement channels, such as email marketing and community events, to reach a broader audience","Technologies":"Customer relationship management (CRM) systems, email marketing platforms, and event management tools","People":"Customers, food truck workers","Owner":"Food truck operators"}]}
